name: Pixel Hooded Sweater
description:
Fall 2013 pixel-patched sweater. Made from twice-washed up-cycled cashmere, sourced locally.
Mens style is hip length. 
Womens style is thigh length.


Re-made in Brooklyn

name: Bioplastic Raincoat
description:
Rain poncho made from potato peels by Equilicua.
Designed to ride your bike and walk your streets. The milky-white material feels great on the skin.


Made in Spain

name: Throw
description:
Cashmere patchwork throw made out of 100% up-cycled cashmere.
Each one is unique, and have its own color story.
Measure 40"'x60".

Re-made in Brooklyn.

name: Small Cushion
description:
Cashmere patchwork cushions made out of 100% up-cycled cashmere, with an insert of cashmere scraps.
Each one is unique, and have its own color story.
15"x15"' with insert and invisible zipper.

Re-made in Brooklyn.

name: Floor Cushion
description:
Cashmere patchwork cushions made out of 100% up-cycled cashmere, with an insert of cashmere scraps.
Each one is unique, and have its own color story.
22'x22' with insert and invisible zipper.

Re-made in Brooklyn.

name: Ceramic Shot Glass
description:
Steve Keister's new line of functional wares are hand-cast and hand-painted by the artist. 
Available in yellow, purple, orange, light orange, blue, light blue, lime green, green, red and red/orange.

Hand-wash only. Made in Brooklyn.

description:

name: Stroller Blanket
description:
Large 27"x36" patched blanket with stitched edge.
Each piece is individually constructed by a skilled craftperson from twice-washed up-cycled* cashmere.

Made in Brooklyn.



*up-cycled means re-purposed for a second life.

name: Cash Endless Scarf

name: Bucket Cashmere Hat
description:

name: Patch Pillow
description:
Square 100% up-cycled tee-shirt pillow with polyester insert and invisible side zipper. White or black vinyl backed.
Measures 18"x18". 

Made In Brooklyn.

name: Pouch
description:
Cyclus designs and makes these durable and stylish pouches out of discarded inner-tubes. Zipped for safety.

Made in Colombia.

name: Flat Wallet Large
description:
Cyclus designs and makes these durable and stylish wallets out of discarded inner-tubes. Available in two sizes, for US dollars or for Euros.

Made in Colombia.

name: Flat Wallet Small
description:
